caseTitle: Tanveer Musharraf v. Government of KPK thr. Chief Secretary, Peshawar & others
tagline: Notwithstanding the definition or status of "civil servant" given or conferred upon any employee of the Federal or Provincial Government under any law or judgment, the benefit of the provisions of the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Buildings (Management, Control and Allotment) Act, 2018 is available only to a special class of civil servants namely those who have been appointed under Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Civil Servants Act, 1973 and Civil Servants of the Federal Government posted and working in Peshawar under the Government.
